verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
"Jesus," O how sweet the name!
"Jesus," every day the same!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
"Jesus," let all saints proclaim
Its worthy praise forever!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
The name of Jesus is so sweet,
I love its music to repeat.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
It makes my joys full and complete,
The precious name of Jesus!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I love the name of Him whose heart,
Knows all my griefs and bears a part,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Who bids all anxious fears depart,
I love the name of Jesus.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
That name I fondly love to hear;
It never fails my heart to cheer;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
It's music dries the falling tear.
Exalt the name of Jesus!

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
No word of man can ever tell
How sweet the name I love so well.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
O let its praises ever swell!
O praise the name of Jesus!
